Type Property# readWrite

macOS 10.5–15.0Deprecated

```
static let readWrite: NSWindow.SharingType
```

Deprecated

Use NSWindowSharingReadOnly instead

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nswindow/sharingtype-swift.enum/readwrite#Discussion)

The window’s contents can be read and modified by another process.
